gear.name: fsl-feat
gear.label: FSL: FEAT - fMRI preprocessing (v6.0)
gear.description: FSL's FEAT (FMRI Expert Analysis Tool). As implemented in this Gear FEAT allows for basic preprocessing of an fMRI dataset including motion correction using MCFLIRT [Jenkinson 2002]; slice-timing correction using Fourier-space time-series phase-shifting; non-brain removal using BET [Smith 2002]; spatial smoothing using a Gaussian kernel; multiplicative mean intensity normalization of the volume at each timepoint; and highpass temporal filtering (Gaussian-weighted least-squares straight line fitting), brain extraction, and registration to a standard image (MNI152).
gear.author: Analysis Group, FMRIB, Oxford, UK.

NIFTI.description: FUNCTIONAL NIfTI file to be processed.

SLICE_FILE.description: SLICE ORDER/TIMING FILE. Must set STC config option to 3.
